thread.title: 4 MSP Partners Awarded Continuum Community Champion at Navigate 2015
thread.title_full: 4 MSP Partners Awarded Continuum Community Champion at Navigate 2015

author: admin
title: 4 MSP Partners Awarded Continuum Community Champion at Navigate 2015
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Continuum Managed IT Services 
LAS VEGAS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Continuum ® , the industry's only channel-exclusive provider of fully integrated managed IT services solutions, presented the Continuum Community Champion Award to four of its Managed Services Provider (MSP) partners at Navigate 2015 , the company’s second annual user conference, taking place on Sunday, September 27 – Tuesday, September 29, 2015 at The Cosmopolitan™ of Las Vegas. The award was presented to Charles Love , Big Sur Technologies; Bryan Sullo , Clocktower; Jeff Delmar , Garner IT Consulting and Mark Wadnizak , VoiceSmart Networks, for fully engaging in Continuum’s social networks and partner forum communities. 
“MSP partners who actively and regularly participate in the many social networks and forums that Continuum offers are better informed and more prepared to assist their clients with technology needs,” said Jeanne Hopkins , Senior Vice President & CMO at Continuum. “We congratulate them on their success and thank them for their leadership in our partner community as well as their involvement at Navigate 2015.” 
Based in Tampa, Florida, Big Sur is a managed services provider for businesses in healthcare, education, state and local government and small to medium businesses. The company provides top-notch technical support to more than 300 customers in the central Florida area. For more information, visit: http://www.bigsurtech.com/ . Charles Love, Director of Service and Cloud Operations at Big Sur, is presenting, “Strategies to Sell the NOC and Help Desk to Your Customers,” at Navigate on Monday, September 28, 2015, 1:00 p.m. – 1:45 p.m. PDT. 
Clocktower Technology Services is an information and communication technology company based in Franklin, Massachusetts. Founded in 2000, the company provides a host of services to businesses and divisions of 10 to 200 employees. For more information, visit: http://www.clocktowertech.com/ . 
Based in Panama City, Florida, Garner IT Consulting is a business consulting company that focuses on technology. They provide virtual CIO value on a small business budget so clients can focus on running their company. They offer network monitoring, remote help desk, vendor management, backup and disaster recovery, email solutions, antivirus and anti-spam solutions, networking and more. For more information, visit: https://www.garner-it.com/ . 
Voice Smart Networks delivers unified communications solutions for Ventura, Los Angeles, Orange, Riverside and San Diego counties. The company’s team of professional is committed to the highest levels of customer support throughout the Southern California and Los Angeles regions. For more information, visit: http://www.voicesmartnetworks.com/ . Mark Wadnizak, Founder and President at VoiceSmart Networks, is presenting on the Navigate partner panel, “Cybersecurity: What’s Your Strategy,” on Monday, September 28, 2015, 1:00 p.m. – 1:45 p.m. PDT. 
Continuum partners can access Collaborate, the company’s private forum launched last year at Navigate 2014, to freely connect, share and learn at https://community.continuum.net . In just one year, Collaborate has over 3,500 members with more than 1,000 active conversations. 
Follow Continuum on Twitter @FollowContinuum and LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/company/2428264 . 
About Navigate 2015 
Navigate 2015, held on Sunday, September 27 – Tuesday, September 29, 2015 at The Cosmopolitan™ of Las Vegas, is a 3-day educational and training event for the industry’s top MSP partners and IT resellers led by top business and channel leaders. Sold out with more than 600 attendees, Navigate 2015 features more than 30 sponsors and exhibitors and more than 60 speakers, to help MSPs take their business to the next level through partner success stories and sales and marketing tactics. For more information on Navigate 2015, visit: http://www.continuum.net/navigate2015 . For the latest updates, follow #nav15 on Twitter. 
About Continuum Managed IT Services 
Continuum is the technology industry's only channel-exclusive provider of fully integrated managed IT services, allowing its Managed Services Provider (MSP) partners to maintain both on premise and cloud-based servers, desktops, mobile devices and other endpoints for small-and-medium-sized businesses. Continuum’s SaaS platform enables MSPs to efficiently backup, monitor, troubleshoot and maintain clients’ IT infrastructurefrom a single pane of glass, all backed by an industry–leading network operations center (NOC) and Help Desk. The company employs over 1,000 professionals worldwide, supports 3,500 partners servicing 50,000 SMB customers and monitors over 700,000 endpoints. In 2012, Continuum established the Continuum Veterans Foundation, a nonprofit organization providing financial support to charities focused on helping veterans find jobs in IT. For more information, visit http://www.continuum.net/ or follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter @FollowContinuum . All trademarks recognized.
